info.title: Domain Reputation API
info.description: Analyze any domain and instantly get a 0-100 reputation score for phishing and fraud detection. Based on DNS, WHOIS/RDAP, email-auth, and security heuristics. Helps detect suspicious, malicious, or untrustworthy domains used in phishing, spam, and fraud. Includes DNS/MX/TXT/NS inspection, SPF/DKIM/DMARC validation, WHOIS & RDAP metadata (registrar, creation date, status), blacklist & free-TLD checks. 1-hour caching to minimize latency. Ideal for cybersecurity tools, SOC automation, anti-phishing filters, and domain classification systems.

get.description: Instantly analyze any domain name and get a 0-100 reputation score with weighted heuristics. Performs comprehensive checks including DNS records (MX, TXT, NS), email authentication (SPF, DKIM, DMARC), WHOIS/RDAP metadata, blacklist status, and free-TLD verification. Returns detailed breakdown of reputation factors and security indicators. JSON response ready for automation or enrichment pipelines.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Domain name to analyze, e.g.: example.com, suspicious-site.xyz, phishing-test.tk
